Ingredients: 1 (1 lb) box penne or penne rigate
3/4 cup chicken broth or beef broth
Instructions: Melt butter in a pan and sauté garlic until fragrant
Stir in flour to form a roux, then gradually add broth and milk while stirring
Cook the sauce until it thickens, then add seasonings and Parmesan
Mix the sauce with hot pasta and serve immediately

Ingredients: 1 lb mushrooms (portobello, cremini, shiitake, or mix), trimmed and sliced
15 oz can black beans, drained and rinsed
Instructions: Cook mushrooms in olive oil with salt, soy sauce, tomato paste,ca and garlic until soft and browned
Mash black beans and mix with eggs, panko, cheese, and cooked mushrooms to form a burger mixture
Shape into patties and cook in a skillet until browned on both sides
Mix mayonnaise and sriracha, then serve burgers on toasted buns with sriracha mayo and desired toppings

Ingredients: 3 dashes hot sauce, or to taste
1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, or to taste
Instructions: Steam eggs until hard boiled, then cool and peel
Mix mayonnaise, salt, sugar, mustard, hot sauce, lemon juice, and rice vinegar to make Kewpie-style mayo
Mash eggs with seasonings, cream, and Kewpie mayo; chill for at least 1 hour
Butter bread slices, spread egg salad evenly, assemble sandwiches, and optionally remove crusts

Ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon dried whole Mexican oregano, rubbed to a powder
1 (12 ounce) bottle cold beer, plus more to thin batter if necessary
2 lbs firm meaty fish (cod, snapper etc.)
Secret sauce: 3/4 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 cup low-fat yogurt, 1/2 teaspoon minced garlic, 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro
Instructions: Prepare the batter by whisking together flour, spices, and beer until smooth, then coat trimmed fish pieces with lime juice and salt
Deep fry the battered fish in hot oil until golden and crispy, then drain on a rack; reheat and refry before serving if desired
Assemble tacos by layering the fried fish on tortillas with guacamole, secret sauce, salsa, shredded cabbage, cilantro, and onion

input.image: image of Hot Honey Baked Beans
input.title: Spicy Bean Bake

Ingredients: 3 (15-ounce) cans navy beans, rinsed and drained
1 tablespoon cayenne pepper sauce (such as Franks® RedHot)
Instructions: Cook bacon and onion until bacon is crisp and onion is tender; add garlic and cook briefly
Mix the cooked bacon mixture with beans, honey, ketchup, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, and spices
Bake covered at 350°F for 30 minutes, then uncover and bake until bubbly and thickened, about 30 more minutes

Ingredients: 1 tablespoon grapeseed oil or olive oil
1/3 cup chopped sun-dried tomatoes in oil
Instructions: Sauté shallots and garlic in oil until fragrant
Add spices, tomato paste, sun-dried tomatoes, and chickpeas; coat well and toast spices
Pour in vegetable broth and lemon juice; simmer covered 10 minutes, then stir in coconut milk and remove from heat

Ingredients: Optional toppings: cinnamon, raisins, poppy seeds, dried onion or garlic, sesame seeds
Instructions: Activate yeast by mixing it with sugar and warm water, let stand for 3 minutes
Mix flour and salt, add yeast mixture, knead dough until firm, then let it rise until doubled
Shape dough into bagels, boil briefly in simmering water, then brush with egg white and add toppings
Bake bagels at 350°F for 35 minutes until golden brown and shiny
Bring coconut milk, milk, and sugar to a boil, then add rice and simmer on low until thick and rice is tender, about 20 minutes
Stir in raisins, cardamom, and rose water; cook for a few more minutes
Serve in bowls and garnish with toasted almonds and pistachios
Melt butter and cook paneer cubes until golden, about 5 minutes
Add onions, bell pepper, jalapeños, spices, and pastes; cook until fragrant, about 1 minute
Stir in tomato sauce, half-and-half, and salt; simmer until thickened, about 30 minutes
Cream margarine and sugar, then mix in sour cream, baking soda, and eggs one at a time
Sift baking powder and flour, then add to the mixture
Fold 3/4 of the topping ingredients into the batter and pour into a greased 9x13 inch pan
Sprinkle remaining topping on cake and bake at 350°F for 55 minutes
